title: Broadcasting rights revenue of European soccer leagues 2017/2018
summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Revenue in million euros in the y axis.
The maximum Revenue in million euros 3210.0 is found at Country England and the minimum is found at Austria where Country is 22.0.
There is a difference of 3188.0 between the maximum Country England and minimum Country Austria.
